zh-cn: 纳尔逊·罗利拉拉·曼德拉

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离活动家、政治家，曾任南非总统、非洲人国民大会主席及不结盟运动秘书长，被广泛尊为“南非国父”。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid activist and politician who served as President of South Africa, President of the African National Congress, and Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement. Widely regarded as the 'Father of the Nation' in South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非的执政党，自1994年种族隔离制度结束后一直执政至今。
description.en: The governing political party of South Africa, in power since the end of apartheid in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 1948年至1994年间在南非实行的一种种族隔离制度。
description.en: A system of institutionalised racial segregation that existed in South Africa from 1948 until the early 1990s.

nodes.id: 弗雷德里克·威廉·戴克拉克

zh-cn: 弗雷德里克·威廉·戴克拉克

description.zh-cn: 南非白人种族隔离时期的最后一任总统，与曼德拉共同获得诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: The last president of apartheid-era South Africa, who shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Nelson Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治家，曾任纳尔逊·曼德拉的副总统，后接任成为南非总统。
description.en: A South African politician who served as the deputy president to Nelson Mandela and later succeeded him as President of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Nelson Mandela.

nodes.id: 温妮·马迪基泽拉-曼德拉

zh-cn: 温妮·马迪基泽拉-曼德拉

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离活动家，纳尔逊·曼德拉的第二任妻子。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid activist and the second wife of Nelson Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 莫桑比克政治家和人道主义者，莫桑比克前总统萨莫拉·马歇尔的遗孀，纳尔逊·曼德拉的第三任妻子。
description.en: A Mozambican politician and humanitarian, widow of former Mozambican president Samora Machel, and the third wife of Nelson Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 非洲人国民大会的武装组织。
description.en: The armed wing of the African National Congress.

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离活动家，非洲人国民大会的重要成员，曼德拉的导师和战友。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid activist, a leading member of the African National Congress, and a mentor and comrade to Nelson Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治家，南非共产党长期领导人，与曼德拉共同创立“民族之矛”。
description.en: A South African politician, long-time leader of the South African Communist Party, and a co-founder of Umkhonto we Sizwe with Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 一场著名的审判，导致纳尔逊·曼德拉及其同志被判终身监禁。
description.en: A famous trial that resulted in the imprisonment of Nelson Mandela and his comrades for life.

description.zh-cn: 南非的一个共产主义政党，在反种族隔离斗争中与非洲人国民大会结盟。
description.en: A communist party in South Africa, allied with the African National Congress in the struggle against apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 位于南非东开普省的一所公立大学，是许多非洲领导人的母校。
description.en: A public university in Alice, Eastern Cape, South Africa, and the alma mater of many African leaders.

description.zh-cn: 南非约翰内斯堡的一所多校区公立研究型大学。
description.en: A multi-campus public research university situated in Johannesburg, South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 非洲最大的大学系统，主要采用远程教育模式。
description.en: The largest university system in Africa by enrollment, primarily offering distance education.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学的中央学术机构，为世界各地的学生提供远程和灵活学习课程。
description.en: A central academic body of the University of London which offers distance and flexible learning programmes to students worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 南非的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 一个由120个发展中国家组成的论坛，它们在冷战期间不正式与任何主要大国集团结盟，也不反对任何主要大国集团。
description.en: A forum of 120 developing world states that are not formally aligned with or against any major power bloc.

description.zh-cn: 南非东开普省的一个村庄，纳尔逊·曼德拉的出生地。
description.en: A village in the Eastern Cape province of South Africa, the birthplace of Nelson Mandela.

description.zh-cn: 南非最大的城市，豪登省的省会。
description.en: The largest city in South Africa and the provincial capital of Gauteng.

description.zh-cn: 诺贝尔奖之一，旨在表彰为促进民族国家团结友好、取消或裁减常备军队以及为和平会议的组织和宣传尽到最大努力或作出最大贡献的人。
description.en: One of the five Nobel Prizes, awarded to those who have "done the most or the best work for fraternity between nations, for the abolition or reduction of standing armies and for the holding and promotion of peace congresses".

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离政治家，非洲人国民大会的核心人物，曾于1967年至1991年担任非国大主席。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid politician and a central figure in the African National Congress, serving as its President from 1967 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 南非种族隔离结束后，为处理种族隔离时期严重侵犯人权行为而设立的恢复性司法机构。
description.en: A restorative justice body assembled in South Africa after the end of apartheid to deal with gross human rights violations committed during the apartheid era.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉与伊芙琳·梅斯于1944年结婚，并于1958年离婚。
description.en: Nelson Mandela and Evelyn Mase were married in 1944 and divorced in 1958.

relationships.target: 温妮·马迪基泽拉-曼德拉

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉与温妮·马迪基泽拉于1958年结婚，1992年分居，并于1996年离婚。
description.en: Nelson Mandela and Winnie Madikizela married in 1958, separated in 1992, and divorced in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉与格拉萨·马谢尔于1998年结婚，直至曼德拉去世。
description.en: Nelson Mandela and Graça Machel married in 1998 and remained together until Mandela's death.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉长期是非洲人国民大会的核心成员，并于1991年至1997年担任其主席。
description.en: Nelson Mandela was a key member of the African National Congress for many years and served as its President from 1991 to 1997.

description.zh-cn: 历史研究及南非共产党官方确认，曼德拉在50年代末或60年代初曾加入南非共产党并在其中央委员会任职，直至1962年被捕。
description.en: Historical research and the SACP have confirmed that Mandela joined the South African Communist Party in the late 1950s or early 1960s and served on its Central Committee until his arrest in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 1961年，纳尔逊·曼德拉与乔·斯洛沃、瓦尔特·西苏卢共同创立了非洲人国民大会的武装组织“民族之矛”，并担任其主席。
description.en: In 1961, Nelson Mandela co-founded Umkhonto we Sizwe, the armed wing of the ANC, with Joe Slovo and Walter Sisulu, and served as its chairman.

description.zh-cn: 1961年，瓦尔特·西苏卢与纳尔逊·曼德拉、乔·斯洛沃共同创立了非洲人国民大会的武装组织“民族之矛”。
description.en: In 1961, Walter Sisulu co-founded Umkhonto we Sizwe, the armed wing of the ANC, with Nelson Mandela and Joe Slovo.

description.zh-cn: 1961年，乔·斯洛沃与纳尔逊·曼德拉、瓦尔特·西苏卢共同创立了非洲人国民大会的武装组织“民族之矛”。
description.en: In 1961, Joe Slovo co-founded Umkhonto we Sizwe, the armed wing of the ANC, with Nelson Mandela and Walter Sisulu.

description.zh-cn: “民族之矛”是作为非洲人国民大会的武装联盟而成立的。
description.en: Umkhonto we Sizwe was established as the armed wing of the African National Congress.

description.zh-cn: 由于领导反对南非种族隔离制度的运动，纳尔逊·曼德拉被南非政府监禁了27年。
description.en: For leading the movement against the apartheid system, Nelson Mandela was imprisoned by the South African government for 27 years.

description.zh-cn: 在里沃尼亚审判中，纳尔逊·曼德拉被判犯有破坏公共设施等罪名，并被判处终身监禁。
description.en: In the Rivonia Trial, Nelson Mandela was convicted of sabotage and other charges, and sentenced to life imprisonment.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·戴克拉克

description.zh-cn: 1990年，时任南非总统的戴克拉克宣布无条件释放纳尔逊·曼德拉，并解除对非洲人国民大会等政党的禁令，开启了终结种族隔离的谈判进程。
description.en: In 1990, then-President F. W. de Klerk announced the unconditional release of Nelson Mandela and unbanned political parties like the ANC, initiating the negotiation process to end apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉在1994年南非首次多种族大选中当选为总统。
description.en: Nelson Mandela was elected president in South Africa's first multiracial general election in 1994.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·戴克拉克

description.zh-cn: 在曼德拉领导的全国统一政府中，戴克拉克担任第一副总统，直至1996年其所在的国民党退出联合政府。
description.en: In Mandela's Government of National Unity, F. W. de Klerk served as First Deputy President until his National Party withdrew from the coalition in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 在曼德拉担任总统期间，塔博·姆贝基担任副总统，并在曼德拉退休后接任总统。
description.en: During Mandela's presidency, Thabo Mbeki served as Deputy President and succeeded him as president upon his retirement.

description.zh-cn: 因其在结束南非种族隔离制度方面所作的努力，纳尔逊·曼德拉与戴克拉克共同获得1993年诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: For their work in ending the apartheid system in South Africa, Nelson Mandela and F. W. de Klerk were jointly awarded the 1993 Nobel Peace Prize.

relationships.target: 弗雷德里克·威廉·戴克拉克

description.zh-cn: 因其在结束南非种族隔离制度方面所作的努力，戴克拉克与纳尔逊·曼德拉共同获得1993年诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: For their work in ending the apartheid system in South Africa, F. W. de Klerk and Nelson Mandela were jointly awarded the 1993 Nobel Peace Prize.

description.zh-cn: 作为总统，纳尔逊·曼德拉监督成立了真相与和解委员会，以调查种族隔离时期的侵犯人权行为。
description.en: As president, Nelson Mandela oversaw the establishment of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission to investigate human rights abuses during apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉出生于南非开普省的姆韦佐村。
description.en: Nelson Mandela was born in the village of Mvezo in Cape Province, South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 纳尔逊·曼德拉在1998年至1999年间担任不结盟运动秘书长。
description.en: Nelson Mandela served as the Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement from 1998 to 1999.
